headline.main: VETERANS ASK CUT OF TIES WITH REICH; Association of Disabled in This State Supports Resolution of Representative Celler

lead_paragraph: The State executive committee of the Disabled American Veterans of the World War, at a meeting in the Hotel New Yorker, adopted yesterday a resolution calling, in effect, for immediate severance of diplomatic relations with Nazi Germany, "to be followed, if our leadera see fit, by a declaration of war."
abstract: Repr Celler's resolution for severance of ties with Germany backed by Disabled Amer World War Veterans

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: VETERANS, DISABLED AMER, OF THE WORLD WAR
